about_the_game:
You've spent seven days alongside the Grim Reaper - you, an ordinary(?) person, and him, someone that shouldn't exist.


Throughout these seven days, you've laughed, you've cried, you've fallen in love... but so many mysteries still remain.

Who really is he, and how did he come to exist in the first place?

Delve deeper into the story of A Date with Death with a brand new route, starting with a new day 6 and leading all the way until day 10. New conversations, new art, and the same Grim Reaper you've come to love awaits you, all wrapped up in a mystery-solving, humorous, domestic package.

About

A Date with Death is a supernatural romance chat simulator visual novel about the week long bet you enter against the Grim Reaper to attempt to keep your soul. When complications arrive and your bet needs to be extended, you'll spend additional days chatting, calling and talking in person with the Grim Reaper himself.

Features

💀 Additional Content: Five brand new days of chatting and calling with your favorite babygirl reaper.
💀 Brand New Art: A host of brand new CGs from original game artist Fuyuure!
💀 New Endings: Four new endings that lead into your future (or not) with Grim.
